title: Favourite Game
body: Favourite Game OTHER THAN League Of Legends®

replies.body: Risk of rain or Banjo kazooie

Well, my love for fighting games will always stay the same.

Tekken (series: all).
My first Tekken I've played was Tekken 4.
On Tekken Dark Resurrection I got Tekken lord on Lee Chaolan so I'm very proud of that fact :D

But aside from fighting games my favourite will always, ALWAYS *ALLLLLLWWWWAAAAAYYYYSSS* be Ratchet and Clank. Thank God they're bringing the game back

My mind is open to lots of games, i'd rather pc games as they are easier to handle, but a lot of good games are usually on console

Ps: I don't thing League of Legends is anyone's favourite game (if they are in the right mind anyway, it's too toxic for that)

Harvest Moon: Back to Nature

Most addicting game I ever played.

tbh if league is your favourite game you have shit taste.

mine's golden sun: the lost age
